name: Emi Labs
headline: Helping great teams hire better frontline workers, faster.
description:
At Emi Labs (YC '19) we are on a mission to increase frontline workers' access to
professional opportunities by building the infrastructure for Frontline Workers (check our
manifesto here: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/our-manifesto-building-infrastructure-frontline-workers-emi-labs/). As our first step, we are transforming the high-volume recruiting
process of Frontline Workers to make it as simple, human, and fair as possible for both
Candidates and Recruiters. Our product is a SaaS recruitment platform powered by AI
that helps companies engage with candidates via text to drive faster and more efficient
hiring processes. We are growing fast, well funded, and obsessed with making our mission
a reality.

Some of their customers include Walmart, Burger King, Starbucks, 7-Eleven, Danone, Imperfect Foods, and Heineken.
generated_description:
Emi Labs is a recruitment technology company founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's W19 batch. Located in Buenos Aires, Argentina, it focuses on transforming the hiring process for frontline workers—those employees who are often the backbone of industries like retail and hospitality.

### Mission
The core mission of Emi Labs is simple yet powerful: help outstanding teams hire better frontline workers, faster. This is not just about streamlining the process; it’s about creating more equitable access to job opportunities for frontline workers. 

### Product Offering
Emi Labs offers a SaaS recruitment platform powered by AI that revolutionizes high-volume hiring. Their innovative solution engages candidates through text messaging—making the whole process more human, efficient, and fair. Features of the platform include:

- **Attraction**: Simplifies candidate sourcing across various channels like WhatsApp and SMS.
- **Screening**: Employs intelligent screening rules to identify top talent quickly.
- **Scheduling**: Streamlines interview coordination, making it easier for candidates and recruiters to connect.
- **Onboarding**: Enhances the experience for new hires through digitized processes and support.
- **Analytics**: Provides real-time measurement of every stage in the hiring pipeline.

### Clients and Impact
Emi Labs boasts an impressive clientele that includes major brands like Walmart, Burger King, Starbucks, and Heineken. Their approach has yielded remarkable results for these companies, such as:

- 50% reduction in time-to-hire.
- 2.3x increase in HR productivity.
- 88% candidate satisfaction score.

### Growth and Structure
With a team of about 50 employees, Emi Labs is growing quickly and is well-funded, underscoring the industry's demand for effective recruitment solutions. They are tagged as a leader in the recruiting technology space and continue evolving to meet the specific needs of frontline recruitment.

### Conclusion
In a world where frontline workers are often overlooked, Emi Labs is working hard to change that narrative. By leveraging AI and thoughtful design, they're not just after speed; they aim for fairness and accessibility in hiring. If you're curious to see their platform in action, you can visit their website at [Emi Labs](https://www.emilabs.ai).
